cn.title: 关于一键买卖与币币兑换功能恢复的通知

message.data: 比特派一键买卖与币币兑换功能优化已完成，相关功能将于香港时间2020年5月8日早 07:00 准时恢复。服务优化后盘口更小，价格更优。欢迎您前来体验

en.title: Resumption of Fiat Buy/Sell Onramp and Coin Swap

message.data: Bitpie has now accomplished the upgrade and optimization of Fiat Buy/Sell Onramp and Coin Swap. All functions are resumed with better bid-ask spread and more convenient experiences at 07:00, May 8, 2020 (UTC+8). You’re welcome to have a try!
